name: Beetle
definition: Increase damage of any Character Skill attacks by 33%. Increase it by a further 1% for each player level.

name: Blacksmith's Gear
definition: Normal anvils can be used twice. Only applies to anvils since taking this item.

name: Body Pillow
definition: Gain a shield that absorbs up to 15 damage. Every 15 seconds, this shield refreshes. Also reduces damage taken by 10%.

name: Breastplate
definition: Reduce damage taken by 25% and SPD by 10%. When attacked there is a 50% chance the attacker also takes 200% damage.

name: Candy Kingdom Sweets
definition: Increase Haste by 40%. All attacks deal 0.75x damage, but have a 10% chance to apply a second attack dealing 33% of the initial damage.

name: Chicken's Feather
definition: Gain 1 revive. On revive, instantly heal 50% HP and all non-Boss targets are defeated.

name: Corporation Pin
definition: Every 40% of Pick Up Radius also increases attack area of all weapons by 2%.

name: Credit Card
definition: Cost of enhancing is reduced by 20% and anvils appear 20% more often.

name: Devil Hat
definition: After using Special, gain a 25 second buff that increases the damage of all Ranged and Multi-Shot weapons by 1.3x.

name: Energy Drink
definition: Increase Haste by 10% and SPD by 40%, but reduce Max HP by 20% as well.

name: Face Mask
definition: Multiply all damage dealt by 1.3 times and increase Haste by 10%. Take 30% more damage.

name: Focus Shades
definition: All ranged or multi-shot projectile weapons have +10% chance to crit, and if it does, the target takes 500% of the weapon's damage over 5 seconds.

name: Full Meal
definition: All healing is doubled.

name: Gorilla's Paw
definition: Attack damage is multiplied by 1.2 times, but lose 20% critical chance.

name: GWS Pill
definition: While the Special meter is still charging, increase crit by 15%. Also increase damage of all Skill attacks by 20%.

name: Halu
definition: Increase regular fan spawns, and fans become 5% stronger. Gain 1 HoloCoin for every 5 targets defeated since taking this item.

name: Headphones
definition: 15% chance to negate 1 hit, and create a shockwave that knocks back all targets.

name: Hope Soda
definition: Increase critical hit damage 10% and increase Special cooldown by 25%.

name: Idol Costume
definition: Reduce Special cooldown by 20%.

name: Injection Type Asacoco
definition: Lose 5% HP every second (until 1 HP remains), but gain 40% ATK.

name: Just Bandage
definition: Increase Max HP by 10. After being hit, heal 10% HP every 3 seconds until 80% of the damage taken is recovered (recovers minimum 1 HP).

name: Knightly Milk
definition: Increases attack size and knockback effects of weapons by 10%. Also increase Pick Up Range by 30%.

name: Kusogaki Shackles
definition: Reduce the negative effects of any items placed on the player by 33%.

name: Limiter
definition: Gain 100% Pick Up Range.

name: Membership
definition: Lose 3 HoloCoin every second. If HoloCoins is more than 0, increase ATK by 30% and take 10% less damage.

name: Ninja Headband
definition: Increase SPD by 20%. In addition, increase damage of Melee weapons by 5%.

name: Nurse's Horn
definition: When defeating a target, there is a 30% chance to life-steal 2 HP. If taking a hit while HP is less than 15%, there is a chance to heal 20% HP.

name: Piki Piki Piman
definition: Gain 15 Max HP. For every 6 points of total Max HP, increase damage of Main Weapon and Special attacks by 1%.

name: Plushie
definition: Delay taken damage. On any hit by a target, take only 30% of the damage initially, then take the remaining damage gradually.

name: Promise Tiara
definition: Increase the drop rate of Stamps by 30%. For each stamp that has ever dropped, gain +0.5% Crit and +1% Haste permanently.

name: Raven Feather
definition: Gain +1 life. Increase 6% ATK every minute. Upon losing 1 life, lose the gained ATK and lose 50% gained HoloCoins at the end of the game.

name: Researcher's Coat
definition: Gain 1% EXP every 2 seconds. When HP is full, the EXP rate slowly increases to 2%, and is reset to 1% EXP when taking damage.

name: Sake
definition: Gain 1% crit buff every second up to 10%. If taking damage by a target, lose half the buff. If eating food, +5% crit for 10 seconds.

name: Stolen Piggy Bank
definition: Gain 1 coin for every 100px traveled and increase SPD by 20%. However, reduce Pick Up Range by 30%.

name: Study Glasses
definition: Increase EXP gain by 10%. On every level up, increase Weapon damage by 0.3%.

name: Super Chatto Time!
definition: Targets drop 20% more HoloCoins. All HoloCoins are picked automatically.

name: Uber Sheep
definition: Every 10 seconds, food will drop close by. Also increase food drop chance from defeated targets by 10%.
